updates.title: Join our album!
updates.description:
Want your music on Spotify?
Submit your music to our 2021 student album!
updates.details:
You can express interest at the form below.
Also, make sure to check out our 2020 album, Fish Brain,
on Apple Music, Spotify, and Soundcloud!

updates.title: Songwriting Competition!
updates.description:
Show off your musicality by performing to this backing track!
You can rap, sing, do a mashup, improvise a jazz solo, or anything else!
